metadata.dc:author: Cervera Miguel, J I
Ramírez Backhaus, M
Trassierra Villa, M
Jiménez Cruz, F
Bonillo García, M A
Palmero Marti, J L
metadata.dc:description: Vasculitis as paraneoplastic syndrome of renal cell carcinoma has been rarely report. We report a patient who initially was studied for temporal arteritis, and was later diagnosed of a renal cell carcinoma. The vasculitis resolves after surgery treatment of the tumour.
metadata.dc:title: Arteritis de la temporal como forma de presentación del carcinoma de células renales.
[Temporal arteritis as initial manifestation of renal cell carcinoma].
